channel.title: Help Please Zombies Mini-game One Wave 474/317
channel.description:
I am working on a zombies minigame, I know how to do everything with it. I just can't get anymore waves to run..
Heres my pictures:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/9W8ad3T.png[/img] This is the Waves and Coords
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KXoKSBo.png[/img] These is the SpawnNextWave Void and others
[img]http://i.imgur.com/dDQuLJj.png[/img] And this is EndGame and Enter
Enter is my main one.
It's linked to the rest. I have a timer for waiting like pestcontrol. It works fine, And so do the numbers for Wave, Players, Ect.
Location: Client.java [img]http://i.imgur.com/N2uQYfp.png[/img]
Location: Player Assistant [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/5405/gpke.png[/img]
I already killed the 2 Zombies that spawned: [img]http://img14.imageshack.us/img14/6562/z4yh.png[/img]

item.title: Help Please Zombies Mini-game One Wave 474/317
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Strucker:

I dont even wanna read cuz it doesn’t show the colors like eclipse sorry, but why are your methods not static and having the client as param???

Dude, you complain about the wrong things.
This is basically the original PI’s Fight caves, but for zombies.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please Zombies Mini-game One Wave 474/317
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:7, topic:532812”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=651602.msg4374465#msg4374465 date=1381682578]

notepad is fine for me…it just depends on what people like to use

no it depends on if you wanna be a shit programmer for the rest of your rsps (or java) career

aren’t you tired of asking people for help all the time? wanna be able to fix your own errors and make programming 1000x easier?

just get an IDE

Alright lol, but still I personally like notepad and eclipse, but again it doesn’t matter.
[/quote]

You will see these programs actually help you with programming in many ways, and they will actually show you errors before you have to compile.[/quote]
K thanks for the info Ill check it ot

Read full topic

notepad is fine for me…it just depends on what people like to use

no it depends on if you wanna be a shit programmer for the rest of your rsps (or java) career

aren’t you tired of asking people for help all the time? wanna be able to fix your own errors and make programming 1000x easier?

just get an IDE
[/quote]

You will see these programs actually help you with programming in many ways, and they will actually show you errors before you have to compile.
